Self.Wiki: Determines the default graphics configuration levels.

textureFilterQuality.Wiki: The texture filter quality to default to.

aaQuality.Wiki: The anti-aliasing (AA) quality to default to.

ssaoQuality.Wiki: The screen-space ambient occlusion (SSAO) quality to default to.

dofQuality.Wiki: The depth of field (DOF) quality to default to.

motionBlurQuality.Wiki: The motion blur quality to default to.

shadowQuality.Wiki: The shadow quality to default to.

lightingQuality.Wiki: The lighting quality to default to.

effectQuality.Wiki: The particle effect quality to default to.

decalQuality.Wiki: The decal quality to default to.

reflectionQuality.Wiki: The reflection quality to default to.

waterQuality.Wiki: The water quality to default to.

shaderQuality.Wiki: The shader quality to default to.

volumetricEffectQuality.Wiki: The volumetric particle quality to default to.

raytracingQuality.Wiki: The raytracing quality (RT) to default to.

giDataQuality.Wiki: The global illumination (GI) quality to default to.
